abstract: The Bundesbank said there would be no “imminent” announcement regarding Axel Weber, who is seen as the front-runner to become head of the European Central Bank this year.
snippet: The Bundesbank said there would be no “imminent” announcement regarding Axel Weber, who is seen as the front-runner to become head of the European Central Bank this year.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT Axel Weber, president of the Bundesbank, may remove himself as a candidate to become president of the European Central Bank, potentially opening up the race for what is arguably the Continent’s most important public post, according to German media and wire reports on Wednesday.

headline.main: European Central Bank Candidate Said to Be Wavering
headline.print_headline: European Central Bank Candidate Said to Be Wavering
